item.title: About Data...
item.description: While working with statistics it is vital to keep in mind the various types of data and sorts of statistical analysis that are appropriate for each type. For example, it is very common for people to report the “average” of a Likert scale item, but that is applying a continuous data method to an ordinal data variable and the result is of dubious value.
